attributes.action: Discount any move or suggestion of merging HM Forces with the French Military at any level.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To even consider sharing or merging any part of our national defence is an insult to all our citizens throughout our history.  I wonder what Henry V would have made of this.
We are members of NATO that should be enough. Do not compromise our History or our Future.
